page.title: 19Cramlington:Attitudes
page.content:
The children of Crawhall First School found out,by means of a questionnaire, what the people of Cramlington think about their town. The questions were compiled by the children, and they tried to ask a good cross section of the inhabitants of the town. They found out that: a) People think it is quite a pleasant place to live. b) People chose to live here because it was convenient for their work or because they have roots here. c) The changes they would like to see are: 1 more employment 2 better policing 3 provision of a hospital 4 provision of a second High School or College 5 greater tidiness
Crawhall F.S.
